name: theme-change
description: Change CSS theme with toggle, buttons or select using CSS Variables and localStorage

scripts.build:all: concat -o dist/index.js src/toggle.js src/btn.js src/select.js src/exportAll.js
scripts.build: npm run makedir:dist && npm run build:btn && npm run build:toggle && npm run build:select && npm run build:all
scripts.min: minify dist/btn.js > dist/btn.min.js && minify dist/select.js > dist/select.min.js && minify dist/toggle.js > dist/toggle.min.js && minify dist/index.js > dist/index.min.js
